
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


add_subdirectory(protos)

add_executable(ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut)
target_include_directories(ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/config/tools/protobuf_plugin
)
target_link_libraries(ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  cpp-testing-unittest
  protobuf_plugin-ut-protos
)
target_sources(ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/config/tools/protobuf_plugin/ut.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)
target_allocator(ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut
  system_allocator
)
vcs_info(ydb-core-config-tools-protobuf_plugin-ut)
